entries: Having once sampled Numerian fluids, you've tasted knowledge beyond comprehension. You are driven to recapture that astounding experience.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Intelligence or Constitution, and one is a free ability boost.
You're trained in the {@skill Crafting} skill and the {@skill Lore||Alchemical Lore} skill. You gain the {@feat Alchemical Crafting} skill feat.
